text: uh Bridgewater is a global macroeconomic
investment firm economic research is
fundamental to the way we work at
Bridgewater to do economic research at
scale we need to analyze a lot of data
using Amazon S3 Amazon EMR we have built
an entire economic research platform on
which we do our work every day on one
side it is used for very exploratory
work on the other side it's used in
production running daily mission
critical systems we've leveraged AWS for
both of them fundamentally our customers
want to think about what's the inflation
going to do to us how would this affect
the economy going forward we want to
provide a solution where the technology
is not even in the picture that feels
like magic and for us to do that we need
to make sure that things scale
leveraging our platform and building it
on top of AWS helped that a lot all I
can say is 10 years ago we used to
process certain number of data 10 years
later we process almost 100 times that
and I think a lot of that we can
attribute to this partnership
